name: Advanced Python
description: Python is a high-level, general-purpose programming language. Its design philosophy emphasizes code readability with its use of significant indentation.
author: Python Software Foundation
course_info:
Welcome to the Advanced Python course! This course will expand your Python knowledge, covering advanced topics and practical applications.

50 hours of on-demand videos, 60 coding exercises, 80 quizzes, and 15 assignments to further your expertise in Python development.

Led by an experienced Python developer with over 20 years of experience. Perfect for those looking to master Python programming.

section1.title: Advanced Data Structures
section1.content: Explore advanced data structures and their applications in Python.

section2.title: Decorators and Generators
section2.content: Learn about Python decorators and generators for efficient code.

section3.title: Concurrency and Multithreading
section3.content: Understand concurrency and multithreading in Python applications.

section4.title: Python Libraries
section4.content: Master popular Python libraries for data analysis and visualization.

section5.title: Web Development with Django
section5.content: Develop web applications using the Django framework.

section6.title: Testing with PyTest
section6.content: Learn testing techniques using the PyTest library.

section7.title: Best Practices in Python
section7.content: Discuss Python best practices for writing efficient and maintainable code.

section8.title: Capstone Project
section8.content: Apply all the skills learned in a comprehensive capstone project.
